This gallery shows advanced examples of what you can do with the `tinytable` package. Many of the examples were adapted from entries into the [Posit / RStudio Table Contest.](https://posit.co/blog/rstudio-table-contest-2022/) Credit is given to the original authors below each screenshot. The full code and to produce each table is available by clicking on the relevant image.
